qas.question: The first practical solar boat was constructed in what year?
When was the first solar powered boat made?
Who first crossed the Pacific ocean using a solar powered boat?
What was the name of the first solar powered boat that crossed the Atlantic ocean?

context: In <a0_0><a1_0>1975<a1_0/><a0_0/>, the first practical solar boat was constructed in England. By 1995, passenger boats incorporating PV panels began appearing and are now used extensively. In 1996, <a2_0>Kenichi Horie<a2_0/> made the first solar powered crossing of the Pacific Ocean, and <a3_0>the sun21 catamaran<a3_0/> made the first solar powered crossing of the Atlantic Ocean in the winter of 2006–2007. There were plans to circumnavigate the globe in 2010.
